extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyValueReader()
      Constructs a basic key-value writer that uses the default renderers and separator.
      KeyValueReader(KeyValueBuilder builder)
      Constructs a key-value writer using the specified key-value list builder
      KeyValueReader(java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,PersistenceRenderer> renderers, PersistenceRenderer arrayRenderer, java.lang.String keyValueSeparator, java.lang.String keyElementSeparator)
      Constructs a key-value reader with that uses the specified key-value separator and key-element separator when parsing the key values.
      KeyValueReader(java.lang.String keySeparator, java.lang.String keyValueSeparator)
      Constructs a basic key-value writer that uses the default renderers and specified separator.

      • setKeyValueSeparator

        public void setKeyValueSeparator(java.lang.String separator)
        Parameters:
        separator - The separator between the key and the value. The default value is given by the KeyValueWriter.KEY_VALUE_SEPARATOR.

      • getKeyValueSeparator

      • setKeyElementSeparator

        public void setKeyElementSeparator(java.lang.String separator)
        Parameters:
        separator - The separator between the key and the value. The default value is given by the AbstractKeyValueBuilder.KEY_ELEMENT_SEPARATOR.

      • getKeyElementSeparator

        public java.lang.String getKeyElementSeparator()
        Returns:
        The separator between the elements of the key.

      • read

        public InfoNode read(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
            java.io.Reader input)
        Description copied from interface: PersistenceReader
        Reads the input stream into a semantic model represented by the return root InfoNode.
        Specified by:
        read in interface PersistenceReader
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class to use as a template for creating the semantic model. This is effectively the "target" class.
        input - The input stream from which to read the persisted object.
        Returns:
        The root InfoNode representing the semantic model.
